description: These are running bear kaomojis. Not much else to say about them. I like the one that’s running to answer the phone. These running bears would also be perfect to use as if they are chasing a scared, running emote, like the ones found earlier in this category.  =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ=͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ=͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ °◦=͟͟͞͞ʕ̡̢̡ु•̫͡•ʔ̡̢̡ु ☏ =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̀=͟͟͞͞ʕ•̀▿•́=͟͟͞͞ʕ•̀▿•́ʔ=͟͟͞͞ʕ•̀▿• =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ =͟͟͞͞ʕ•̫͡•ʔ
title: Bears
